testcase.name: View category products
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser........................................................passed And Navigate to url 'mainPage'..............................................passed And Verify that categories are visible on left side bar.....................passed And Click on Women category.................................................passed And Click on any category link under Women category, for example: Dress.....passed And Verify that category page is displayed and confirm text WOMEN - TOPS PRODUCTS.passed And On left side bar, click on any sub-category link of Men category........passed And Verify that user is navigated to that category page.....................passed And Close the page..........................................................passed
